name: Build n' Battle
description:
Build n Battle is Team Misfits' entry in the Human Guild Game Jam.

We are treating this as our MVP for a much larger project we are working on, so feedback is more than welcomed! Saying this, the current state of the game is very rough and has been designed to test the core game mechanics of "buildable maps" where players have the ability to create their own "worlds" which are used in a number of mini-games.

How to Play

THIS GAME IS MULTIPLAYER AND REQUIRES TWO PLAYERS ON THE SAME NETWORK TO PLAY!

Once you and a friend have downloaded the game files, open the .exe file.
Either you or your friend needs to host the game by pressing the "Host" button.  (You have to Tab to use these buttons :( sorry). Then the other party will join via the "Connect" button after they have entered in the IPv4 Address of the host's network. You can find this address by typing in ipconfig to the Command Prompt on Windows

Once the game begins, you will have 60 seconds to build your base. Pressing "F" will put you in build mode. Pressing "1" - "3" will change the building blocks. 

After the build timer has run out... GAME ON! Shoot the other player before they shoot you!
